tooltip.tagban.tools:
List of banned regular expressions
Does not affect armor, totems, etc.
Only applies to player's held items (attacking, placing, and active use)
Format: modID:name_pattern
Examples:
- minecraft:.*_axe (all vanilla axes)
- .*:wooden_.* (all tools with wooden tags)
tooltip.tagban.whitelist:
List of allowed regular expressions (overrides blacklist)
Higher priority than blacklist
Examples:
- minecraft:.*_axe (all vanilla axes)
- .*:wooden_.* (all tools with wooden tags)
- minecraft:iron_sword (iron sword)
tooltip.tagban.tooltip:
Tooltip text displayed for disabled items
Supports translation text
tooltip.tagban: Â§cThis item is disabled by TagBan mod. Can only be used for crafting.
